channel.title: Simple Question You got a simple answer hopefully
channel.description: Ok how would i make it so if i used an item with a door it opened? But if they didn't use the item on it , it would not open any answers?

item.title: Simple Question You got a simple answer hopefully
item.dc:creator: @shadow12 shadow12
item.description:
@shadow12 wrote:

No offence but i ain’t actually tried to make opening doors with a key so what is the void anyone help?

Read full topic
item.source: Simple Question You got a simple answer hopefully

item.title: Simple Question You got a simple answer hopefully
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

it is easy you would make somthing like this:

else if(useItemID 989 && objectX == 1111));
{
                 open();
}

This would make it if you used a crystal key on an object with X cords of 1111 it would start the void “open()”. Change the “open()” to the void for doors opening and change the “1111” to whatever your object’s X cord is that you want this to happen. Change the “989” wot whatever item you want… Enjoy!

~Mod Taharok

Read full topic
